plugins.name: SQL Injection Detector
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Detects SQL injection vulnerabilities through pattern matching and active payload verification (error-based, time-based, boolean-based)

plugins.name: XSS Vulnerability Detector
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Detects Cross-Site Scripting vulnerabilities through passive analysis and active payload verification

plugins.name: Sensitive Information Detector
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Detects sensitive information disclosure in HTTP responses including API keys, credentials, PII, and debug information

plugins.name: URL Encoder/Decoder
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Encode and decode text using various schemes (URL, Base64, HTML entities, Hex, Unicode)

plugins.name: Hash Calculator
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Calculate cryptographic hashes (MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512) with optional HMAC support

plugins.name: Next.js RCE Scanner
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Detect and exploit Next.js prototype pollution RCE vulnerability

plugins.name: Subdomain Enumerator
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Enumerate subdomains using multiple data sources (crt.sh, HackerTarget, RapidDNS, AlienVault, VirusTotal, URLScan, Anubis, DNSDumpster, Sublist3r, CertSpotter)

plugins.name: HTTP Prober
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Probe HTTP/HTTPS endpoints to check if they are alive, collect response info including status code, title, content length, headers, and technologies

plugins.name: Technology Fingerprinter
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Identify technologies, frameworks, CMS, and libraries used by web applications through HTTP headers, HTML content, cookies, and JavaScript analysis

plugins.name: Directory Bruteforcer
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Discover hidden directories, files, and endpoints on web servers using wordlist-based brute forcing

plugins.name: JavaScript Analyzer
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Analyze JavaScript files using AST parsing (acorn) to extract all string literals, then identify API endpoints, secrets, and sensitive data with high accuracy

plugins.name: SSRF Detector
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Detect Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerabilities by testing URL parameters with various payloads

plugins.name: Subdomain Takeover Detector
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Detect potential subdomain takeover vulnerabilities by checking DNS records and service fingerprints

plugins.name: CORS Misconfiguration Detector
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Detect CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) misconfigurations that could allow unauthorized cross-origin access

plugins.name: Open Redirect Detector
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Detect open redirect vulnerabilities by testing URL parameters with various redirect payloads

plugins.name: XSS Scanner
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Active XSS vulnerability scanner that tests URL parameters, form fields, and headers with various payloads including reflected, DOM-based, and filter bypass techniques

plugins.name: SQL Injection Scanner
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Active SQL injection vulnerability scanner that tests parameters with error-based, blind boolean, time-based, and UNION-based techniques for MySQL, PostgreSQL, MSSQL, Oracle, and SQLite

plugins.name: Certificate Monitor
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Monitor SSL/TLS certificates for changes and expiry, generating ChangeEvents for workflow automation

plugins.name: Content Monitor
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Monitor web pages for content changes using hash fingerprinting, generating ChangeEvents for workflow automation

plugins.name: API Monitor
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Monitor API endpoints for changes (new endpoints, removed endpoints, GraphQL/OpenAPI discovery), generating ChangeEvents for workflow automation

plugins.name: Port Monitor
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Monitor hosts for port/service changes, detecting newly opened ports, closed ports, and service changes, generating ChangeEvents for workflow automation

plugins.name: JS Link Finder
plugins.author: Sentinel Team
plugins.description: Find and collect all JavaScript file URLs from a web page, including external scripts, inline scripts, ES modules, webpack chunks, and source maps
